doc.title: Moe Norman: The Short Game
doc.plot: The short game is perhaps the most critical aspect of the golf game, yet the least practiced. Golf Legend, Moe Norman shares the techniques that he used to win 54 Tournaments on his way to becoming a Canadian Hall of Famer. The video features segments on play from 100 yards and 50 yards, sand play, around the green and putting. Hosted by touring professional and Natural Golfer, Todd Graves, this is a great video to add to your Moe Norman collection.
